heading: Learn everything about Vessel of Hatred!
content: Vessel of Hatred and Season 6 are (almost) here and the is excited to give you a sneak peek at our first Season 6 updates coming shortly as well as sharing with you everything we learned while playing Vessel of Hatred in early access as the embargo lift just happened! Today, we are excited to share with you the newest update of D4Planner, which is fully updated with the datamined information from the Diablo 4 2.0.1 Patch Datas! What are the best builds to play in Vessel of Hatred? Don't worry, as usual the Maxroll will provide you with the best and most up to date build guides! The first Season 6 Build Guides will be coming very shortly after this post! Most of the new Build Guides as well as Tier Lists and Resources Updates will come tomorrow saturday on October 5th! Be ready ! Some of your favorite content creators among the got to try Vessel of Hatred in early access! This means they have a lot of informations as well as tips and tricks to share for you to master Vessel of Hatred! Our focus is now more than ever on the Season 6 and Vessel of Hatred’s Launch! As usual, the will provide you with the most accurate resources and guides out there! We're continuing to work on more updates and bug fixes for ! Stay awhile and learn! With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 5 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
